statements: SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data;
SELECT id, data FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'spam';
SELECT label, created_at FROM labeled_training_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT data FROM labeled_training_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'ham' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, data, label FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label='spam';
SELECT label, data FROM labeled_training_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT data, label FROM labeled_training_data WHERE data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, data, label, created_at FROM labeled_training_data ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data;
SELECT data, label, created_at FROM labeled_training_data;
SELECT id, data, label FROM labeled_training_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, data, label, created_at FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'spam';
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_type = 'classification';
SELECT id, data, label, created_at FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'positive' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type, training_data_id FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_type = 'classification' ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT id, label, created_at FROM labeled_training_data WHERE data LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'negative' AND data IS NOT NULL AND id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM labeled_training_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, label, data FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label='positive';
SELECT model_name, model_id FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_name='Logistic Regression';
SELECT * FROM training_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_id, AVG(accuracy) AS average_accuracy FROM training_logs GROUP BY model_id;
SELECT id, data, label FROM labeled_training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM machine_learning_models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, model_id, accuracy, timestamp FROM training_logs WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT model_id, model_name, hyperparameters FROM machine_learning_models WHERE hyperparameters ->> 'learning_rate' = '0.001';
SELECT id, label, data FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label IN ('cat', 'dog', 'rabbit') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_data;
SELECT id, label, created_at FROM labeled_data WHERE label='positive';
SELECT model_name, description FROM model WHERE model_name='Logistic Regression';
SELECT id, data_id, feature_vector FROM training_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT model_id, training_data_id, timestamp FROM model_training_history WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM labeled_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, label, created_at FROM labeled_data WHERE label = 'spam';
SELECT feature_vector, label FROM training_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT model_name, description FROM model WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT model_id, training_data_id, accuracy FROM model_training_history WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM data_sources_mapping;
SELECT label_name, label_id FROM data_labels;
SELECT source_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_id = 2;
SELECT data_value, label FROM labeled_data WHERE data_id = 3;
SELECT data_id, timestamp FROM labeled_data_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_data;
SELECT data_id, data_value, label FROM labeled_data WHERE label = 'example';
SELECT ld.data_id, ld.data_value, dl.label_name FROM labeled_data ld JOIN data_labels dl ON ld.label = dl.label_name;
SELECT * FROM labeled_data_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT ds.source_name, ld.data_value FROM data_sources ds JOIN data_sources_mapping dsm ON ds.source_id = dsm.source_id JOIN labeled_data ld ON dsm.data_id = ld.data_id;
